complaint.description: Since upgrading to 5G, the customer has been experiencing frequent connection issues. Despite contacting Rain multiple times, they have not received any help. The customer is frustrated with the poor connection, buffering, and low signal strength. The call center agents have been unhelpful and repetitive. The customer is extremely dissatisfied and would not recommend Rain's 5G subscriptions.
complaint.suggestion: Rain should investigate and resolve the customer's connectivity issues promptly. They should provide better customer service and improve the overall quality of their 5G service.

meta.review_content: Since I upgraded to 5G everything is a mess being calling rain almost 3 times a week from the 7th of November with the same problem till today the 24th still no help. All I'm getting is a list of reference numbers and no service. They keep on saying reset the router or we've escalated the matter but I'm still suffering from a poor connection. If the router doesn't restart on its own, it's the buffering. My signal strength is between -96 to -138 dBm and they telling me all is well on their side. Their call centre agents are like robots just repeating the same thing. I'm so frustrated right now if there was a better option for wireless internet I would've dropped them immediately. I wouldn't recommend anyone to get any of their 5G subscriptions. I had hope on a dying horse. Ek is gatvol really.
